text: Jaba timiharu tadha bhagdai thiyau ra kasaiko vasta garirakheka thi'enau ra allahaka rasulale timila'i timro pachadibata avaja di'irahanu bha'eko thiyo. Timimathi eka kasta pachi arko duhkha pugyo taki juna kuro timro hatabata hara'umdai thiyo tyasabata duhkhi naho'u ra napugeko kastako lagi udasa naho'u. Allaha sabai kriyakalapako janakari rakhdacha
